- Location: Ceiling HVAC vent (interior), flush mounted.
- Materials: Drywall ceiling with knockdown texture; white metal louvered vent cover (likely aluminum).
- Condition: Vent cover seated cleanly; screws secure; no obvious rust or damage.
- Observations: No visible moisture staining or mold around grille.
- Notes: Edge trim along the adjacent wall/ceiling junction appears standard; nothing else notable.
